testcase.name: Validation_and_Bugs.Should_be_able_to_fill_the_form
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open the site✅ When I fill up the form with the correct data✅ Then The data should be displayed alongside the estimated cost

testcase.name: Validation_and_Bugs.Should_not_accept_invalid_date_formats
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open the site✅ When I type my ticket without defining the dates✅ Then It should throw an Error notifing date formatting

testcase.name: Validation_and_Bugs.Leaving_Date_should_not_be_before_Starting_Date
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open the site✅ When I type my ticket and leaving date is before starting date✅ Then It should throw an Error notifing bad leaving date

testcase.name: Validation_and_Bugs.Should_not_acccept_Invalid_Date_Fortmats
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open the site✅ When I fill the form with invalid date formats❗ Then It should display an Error explaing the invalidness of the date format
